summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE KEY FOB WOULD ACTIVATE INTERMITTENTLY AND THAT THE KEY FAILED TO UNLOCK THE DOORS. THE CONTACT ALSO STATED THAT SHE REPLACED THE BATTERY ON NUMEROUS OCCASIONS HOWEVER THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC, WHO DIAGNOSED THAT THE KEY NEEDED TO BE REPLACED AND REPLACED THE BATTERY IN THE KEY FOB. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 31,116.
